job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Cloud/Data Engineer you will work on two of our most important tracks:
   Development of a data science platform that other teams can use (based on AzureML) &
   Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments.

   You have daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment. We really bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Cloud Data Engineer

As a Cloud/Data Engineer you will work on two of our most important tracks:
   Development of a data science platform that other teams can use (based on AzureML) &
   Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments.

   You have daily contact with the rest of the team and you like to work in an interdisciplinary environment. We really bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data engineering tasks and supporting data scientists, with a mention of AzureML. However, it lacks specific details about developing or deploying generative AI models, fine-tuning LLMs, or building RAG systems, which are core to the GenAI Engineer profile. While it involves AI use cases, the primary emphasis is on the data infrastructure and support for data science experiments, making it lean towards a data engineering role rather than a specialized GenAI Engineer. It doesn't fit the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer either, as it doesn't emphasize algorithm development or predictive modeling as the primary focus. Therefore, 'Ambiguous' is the most appropriate classification due to the lack of specific GenAI or ML engineering focus.

job_tasks.justification: The role explicitly mentions 'Cloud/Data Engineer' and 'Development of a data science platform', which directly relates to building and maintaining data infrastructure.
Developing a platform for other teams to use implies building and managing data infrastructure and tools.
job_tasks.phrase: Development of a data science platform

job_tasks.justification: The role involves supporting data scientists in the development of AI use cases and experiments, which can include model development.
job_tasks.phrase: Supporting our data scientists in the development of AI use cases & Experiments

job_tasks.justification: Building a platform for other teams to use implies software development to create a usable service.
job_tasks.phrase: Development of a data science platform

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'daily contact with the rest of the team' and working in an 'interdisciplinary environment', highlighting collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: daily contact with the rest of the team

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'bring the worlds of Engineering and Data Science together' emphasizes interdisciplinary collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: daily contact with the rest of the team
